Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Horizontally \Hor`i*zon"tal*ly\, adv. In a horizontal direction or position; on a level; as, moving horizontally. [1913 Webster]
horizontally adv : in a horizontal direction; "a gallery quite often is added to make use of space vertically as well as horizontally"
